snippet: As President Obama and Mitt Romney meet in Denver for their first presidential debate, check out The Times’ debate live blog for complete coverage.
abstract: As President Obama and Mitt Romney meet in Denver for their first presidential debate, check out The Times’ debate live blog for complete coverage.
lead_paragraph: As President Obama and Mitt Romney meet in Denver for their first presidential debate, check out The Times’ debate live blog for complete coverage. Times reporters and editors will provide real-time updates, analysis, fact-checking and answers to reader questions. Go to the Live Blog »
